entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
